name: Sign of the Cross
description:
Quick-draw attack. Can only be used when your sword is sheathed.
Command: Hold R1 + Circle button.

name: Sign of the Cross II
description: Greatly reduces time needed to gather energy for a Sign of the Cross attack.

name: Windstorm
description: A spinning attack that slices all around you (High Stance Only)

name: Windstorm II
description: Increases the strength of the wind generated by Windstorm. (High Stance Only)

name: Demon Thrust
description:
A combination move incorporating defense and attack. Thrusts a sword while simultaneously guarding. (Mid Stance Only).
Command: L1 + Square button (Square While Guarding)

name: Mind's Eye
description: You now clearly see, and evade. all incoming attacks during the recovery period followin a dodge. (Low Stance Only)

name: Mind's Eye II
description: When Mind's Eye is successful, increases attack power. (low Stance Only)

name: God of Wind
description:
Follows up a Quick Attack with a roundhouse kick. (Mid/Low Stance Only)
Command: Triangle at end of combo.

name: God of Wind II
description: Allows you to follow-up God of Wind with a quick slash attack by pressing Triangle button again. (Mid/low Stance Only)

name: God of Wind III
description:
Correctly timing an additional press of Triangle button after God of Wind, slows you to perform a quick double slash attack. 
(Mid/low Stance Only)
prerequesite:
God of Wind II
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Random Slice
description: Rushes forward while swinging two swords. (Mid Stance Only)

name: Water Sword
description:
Slices an enemy multiple times. (Hold down the button to alter the attack.) (High Stance Only).
Command: L1 + Triangle (Triangle While Guarding)

name: Water Sword II
description: Increases the slicing speed of the Water Sword technique. (High Stance Only)
prerequesite:
Water Sword
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Cherry Blossom
description:
Follows up a Quick Attack with a jumping slice. (High Stance Only).
Command: Triangle at end of combo

name: Heavenly Flow
description:
Parries an enemy's attack, countering with a stabbing blow. (Mid Stance Only)
Command: L1 +Triangle Button (Triangle While guarding)

name: Earthly Flow
description:
Parries an enemy's attack. countering with a cutting strike. (Mid Stance Only).
Command: L1 + Square (Square While guarding)

name: The Shrike
description: Parries the enemy, stopping the enemy in their tracks, then folows !trough with two attacks. (Mid Stance Oily)
prerequesite:
Heavenly Flow
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Moon Shadow
description:
Maneuvers behind an enemy after they deflect your attack, then slashes them with an extra. (Mid/low Stance Only).
Command: Press triangle button when an attack is deflected
prerequesite:
God of Wind
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Raijin
description:
moves quickly to the side while slashing. Can be charged to increase the number of strikes.
Command: Hold Triangle.
prerequesite:
Sign of the Cross
Cleared Mission "???"

name: Mortal Flow
description:
Rushes forward and performs a hard thrust, following up with a strong slash if the thrust hits.
Command: L1 + Triangle button (triangle while guarding)

name: Mortal Flow II
description: Adds a gust of wind to the follow-up slash of Mortal Flow, increasing its strength.
prerequesite:
Mortal Flow
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Relentless I
description: Maximum Ki increases by +30 when you have Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.

name: Relentless II
description: Maximum Ki increases by +20 when you have Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Relentless I
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Relentless III
description: Maximum Ki increases by +10 when you have Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.

name: Defense Arts I
description: Increases Ki recover speed while guarding by 30% when you have a dual swords equipped as your main weapon.

name: Defense Arts II
description: Increases Ki recover speed while guarding by 20% when you have a dual swords equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Defense Arts I
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Defense Arts III
description: Increases Ki recover speed while guarding by 10% when you have a dual swords equipped as your main weapon.

name: Tachi Arts I
description: Increases melee damage against enemies with full health by 5% when you have a dual swords equipped as you main weapon.

name: Tachi Arts II
description: Increases melee damage against enemies with full health by 4% when you have a dual swords equipped as you main weapon.
prerequesite:
Tachi Arts I
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Tachi Arts III
description: Increases melee damage against enemies with full health by 3% when you have a dual swords equipped as you main weapon.

name: Full Moon Kata I
description: While in full health, your melee damage increases by 3% when you have a Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Sign of the Cross
Mind's Eye

name: Full Moon Kata II
description: While in full health, your melee damage increases by 2% when you have a Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Full Moon Kata I
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Full Moon Kata III
description: While in full health, your melee damage increases by 1% when you have a Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Full Moon Kata II
Cleared Mission "???"

name: Shadow Strike I
description: Damage dealt to enemies from behind increases by 3% when you have a Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.

name: Shadow Strike II
description: Damage dealt to enemies from behind increases by 2% when you have a Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Shadow Strike I
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Shadow Strike III
description: Damage dealt to enemies from behind increases by 1% when you have a Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.

name: Armor Piercer I
description: Increases Final Blow damage by 4% when you have a Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon

name: Armor Piercer II
description: Increases Final Blow damage by 3% when you have a Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Armor Piercer I
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Armor Piercer III
description: Increases Final Blow damage by 2% when you have a Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.

name: Passage to the Afterlife I
description: Increases grapple damage by 4% when you base a Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.

name: Passage to the Afterlife II
description: Increases grapple damage by 3% when you have a Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Passage to the Afterlife I
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Passage to the Afterlife III
description: Increases grapple damage by 2% when you have a Dual Swords equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Passage to the Afterlife II
Cleared Mission "???"

name: Piercing Wheel
description:
Repel Incoming attack as you stab your enemies over your shouder. (Mid Stance Only).
Command: L1 + Square Button (Square While Guarding)
prerequesite:
Random Slice
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Dual Dragon
description:
Slash at enemy before lauching yourself into the air to bring down a mighty blow on your opponent.
(Low Stance Only).
Command: Triangle button at end of combo.
